name: The almost finished Game
description:
Short little Puzzle Game.  The goal is it to work out what and how to change stuff to make the "game" beatable.

Designed for the Ludum Dare 45 with the theme:  Start with nothing. Worktime: ~18h

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/the-almost-finished-game

Made with:

  • Godot v3.1
  • Gimp 2.10

If anyone is interested in the Sourcecode (bad game jam code without comments):

https://github.com/Ikarus-dvHf/The-almost-finished-Game
